p: According to the crystal symmetry, we have the following modes and the selection rules for IR-active and R-active modes, Γ = A 1g (R) + 2A 2u (IR) + B 1g (R) + B 1u + 2B 2g (R) + 3E u (IR) + 3E g (R). As seen in Figure 3a and Table 2, we observed seven R-active modes in the Raman spectra for TlGaTe 2, whereas Gasanly et al. [ 9] found only three out of seven predicated R-active modes. Our calculated R-active modes confirm the existence of three E g mode with frequencies of 1E g= 19 cm −1 (16 cm −1 [ 31]), 2E g = 60 cm −1 (67 cm −1 [ 9]) and 3E g = 157 cm −1 (165 cm −1 [ 9]). Our calculated R-active modes confirm the existence of one A 1g mode with a frequency of A 1g = 128 cm −1 (135 cm −1 [ 9]) and three B 1g mode with frequencies of B 1g = 76 cm −1 (76 cm −1 [ 31]), B 1g = 99 cm −1 (99 cm −1 [ 31]) and 2B 2g = 216 cm −1 (210 cm −1 [ 31]).
